fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.gl

Class BinaryGradientImage

  • Object
    • BinaryGradientImage

  • public class BinaryGradientImage
extends Object
    Author:
    JeT a texture image is used to project a polygon onto with distance and linear parameterization informations. each pixel contains texture coordinates and some temporary information
